tasks.task: Vertical farming 44 basil plants on an aeroponic tower.
subtasks: Position the body vertically to access the aeroponic tower.
Mix water and ionic mineral nutrient solution.
Measure quantity of water needed for the basil plants.
Transfer the nutrient solution into the growing system.
Monitor the misting frequency of the aeroponic system for optimal plant growth.
Confirm the absence of soil in the growing medium.
Inspect the aeroponic system's water and nutrient circulation.

tasks.task: Harvest basil from the aeroponic tower.
subtasks: Position to reach the basil plants at proper height.
Cut the basil stems using shears or scissors.
Collect the harvested basil leaves or stems.
Regularly check the system for clogs or blockages.
Adjust nutrient solution as needed based on plant growth.
Monitor pH and electrolyte conductivity of the nutrient solution.
Clean and maintain the aeroponic tower between growing cycles.
